title: Gradus
skills: Heroku deployment, React.js, Express.js, Node.js, Mongoose/MongoDB, Bcrypt, Passport.js, JSON Web Token, Web Midi API, Bootstrap
summary: A counterpoint learning system for advanced music theory students
role: Developed user-input virtual piano with full octave range, pair-coded multiple front-end components such as “ExCard”, routed Cantus Firmus database to front-end to display under “pick” on ExCards

title: Todo Toast
skills: Heroku deployment, React.js, Express.js, Node.js, MongoDB, Mongoose, Axios, Bootstrap
summary: Convenient, simple task manager to help you prioritize and accomplish your tasks so that you can spend more time on those things that don't belong on a todo list! Enjoy features such as adding, editing, and marking complete each task. See all tasks in one place. More to follow!

title: Spatify
skills: Heroku deployment, MySQL, Sequelize, Node.js, Handlebars,Later.js, Moment.js, Node Mailer, Materialize
role: Developed and consolidated routes for Handlebars front to back, assisted in creating services page, created home page and form with dynamic buttons for appointment times

title: LIRI Bot
skills: Node.js, Axios, Chalk-Animation, Figlet, Inquirer, Moment.js, Node Spotify API
summary: LIRI is a command line node app that takes in parameters and gives you back data. A user can look up concerts for favorite artists to see when they'll be in town, or call details for songs to know more about them and get a preview, or look up movies to see if they might be an interesting watch!

title: GifTastic
summary: A fun search engine for gifs from the Giphy API. User types in an animal and then presses that dynamically created button to view 10 gifs of that creature.
